opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: United States v. Acme Process Equipment Company

opinion:
384 U.S. 917

86 S.Ct. 1367

16 L.Ed.2d 438

UNITED STATES, petitioner,
v.
ACME PROCESS EQUIPMENT COMPANY.

No. 1116.

Supreme Court of the United States

April 25, 1966

Solicitor General Marshall, Assistant Attorney General Douglas, David L. Rose and Robert V. Zener, for the United States.

Jack Rephan, Raymond R. Dickey and Bernard Gordon, for respondent.

1

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Claims granted and case placed on the summary calendar.
